CustomField.description: generates a printable text value of the ime time
CustomField.formula: IF (ISBLANK( litify_ext__Time_of_IME__c), "", TEXT(IF(HOUR(litify_ext__Time_of_IME__c) <= 12, HOUR(litify_ext__Time_of_IME__c) , (HOUR(litify_ext__Time_of_IME__c) -12) )) & ":" & LPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(litify_ext__Time_of_IME__c)),2,'0') & IF (HOUR(litify_ext__Time_of_IME__c) < 12, " AM", " PM") )
CustomField.label: Time of IME Print
